articles.title: When Kapil Dev Had Used Vinod Kambli's Example To Warn Youngsters - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Kapil Dev drew comparison between Kambli and his childhood mate Sachin Tendulkar to explain why it was important for young cricketers to stay focussed.
